description: [Dragonfly](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0035) has manipulated .lnk files to gather user credentials in conjunction with [Forced Authentication](https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1187).(Citation: US-CERT TA18-074A)

external_references.description: US-CERT. (2018, March 16). Alert (TA18-074A): Russian Government Cyber Activity Targeting Energy and Other Critical Infrastructure Sectors. Retrieved June 6, 2018.
